author: milamber
msg: Prepare next version 2.6: adjust version in download_jmeter and add download_jmeter.cgi to docs

author: rdonkin
msg: Support deployment of site via CMS through profile. Use mvn site:deploy -Pcms to deploy into stage. Run a tool to fix line endings, then commit (in stage since it's external). The buildbot should pick up the changes and deploy without further ado.

author: milamber
msg: Prepare next release 2.6: update docs tree and overview
